document_data.name: Thaola's Wineshop
document_data.mainbody: '''Thaola's Wineshop''' was a [[wine]] shop in [[Leuthilspar]] on the island of [[Evermeet]].
document_data.Geography: Thaola's shop was located east of [[Dhoelath's Tower]] and north of the [[Shrine of the Black Sword]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The shop was owned by [[Thaola]] who sold vintage [[elf|elven]] wines.
document_data.History: Around [[1367 DR]], Thaola had a single bottle of wine from [[Myth Drannor]].
